definition[0]: the past tense and past participle of feed1
definition[1]: a police officer in the FBI
definition[2]: a criminal's name for an FBI agent
definition[3]: a person who works for a US government agency and is often seen as causing trouble in the lives of ordinary people
definition[6]: an informal name for the FEDERAL RESERVE BANK, the FEDERAL RESERVE BOARD, or the FEDERAL RESERVE SYSTEM
example[0]: The bond market rallied as the Fed eased monetary conditions.
